title: Update Account
name: Update_Account
description:
Edit account data. API can accept only changed fields.However id and sfdcAccountId are mandatory.
Following fields can't be updated:
awsAssetsKeyPrefix
appEntities
sfdcAccountId

examples.title: Example request
examples.content:

 account:
{
    "name" : "Parkway C-2 School District updated",
    "cname" : "parkwayschools",
    "tickerSymbol" : null,
    "dunsNumber" : null,
    "webSite" : "http://parkway.brightergy.com",
    "phone" : "1111111111",
    "email" : "AdamAdmin@brightergy.com",
    "sfdcAccountId" : "001C0000013iMilIAE"
}

title: Verify Account CNAME
name: Verify_Account_CNAME
description: Check if the given account CName is vaild

title: Get General Assets
name: Get_General_Assets
description: Retrieves the All general assets. When the research key is specified, it retrieves the associated general assets including search name. searchKey is mandatory.

title: Get Enphase Auth URL
name: Get_Enphase_Auth_URL
description: Retrieves the enphase auth URL of currently logged in user.

title: Get Enphase Inventory
name: Get_Enphase_Inventory
description: Retrieves the the inventory list of Enphase System by Id

title: Get Manufactures or Enphase systems
name: Get_Manufactures_or_Enphase_systems
description: Retrieves the list of manufactures. when company query equals ehphase, it retrieves the list of enphase systems of logged in user.

creator

title: Edit Presentation
name: Edit_Presentation
description:
Edit presentation data with given new data. API can accepts only changed fields. however, id and creatorRole is mandatory.
Following fields can't be updated:
tagBindings
awsAssetsKeyPrefix
creator
creatorRole

title: Search Users
name: Search_Users
description: Retrieves the users that have the searchKey in Name.

title: Set Password
name: Set_Password
description: Check user with given token and set new password

title: Update User
name: Update_User
description:
Edit user informations and retrieves the updated one. API can accepts the only changed fields. However id is mandatory.
Following fields can't be updated:
role
password
socialToken
enphaseUserId
tokens
sfdcContactId
profilePictureUrl
accessibleTags

Parameter.description: user profile picture data, null if picture is cropped binary data
"true" if picture is cropped binary data, or null
set if picture is cropped binary data
